metadata.title: CVE-2016-4561 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the cgierror function in CGI.pm in ikiwiki before 3.20160506 might allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors involving an error message.

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20180228-1').
